attributes.action: Make the CPS vigorously prosecute those who assault and abuse A&E NHS staff.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
NHS staff are badly paid and treated with little respect by their employers.  Most have given up even imagining that this will ever change.

Now it seems that they must also accept being used as punchbags at work.  If someone rammed a syringe in the PM's hand, or wrapped a chair around his head, I think it quite likely that the CPS would prosecute the case.

Do our nurses, doctors and auxilliary staff deserve any less as they struggle to treat drunk and abusive patients.

The PM should ensure that the CPS are forced to stop dropping cases.

We have a moral obligation to protect people at work, and to prosecute those who abuse them
